name: Gym Class - by IRL Studios
headline: Play basketball in virtual reality
description: Gym Class is the most popular sports experience in virtual reality - and the best way to play basketball with people from all over the world. Make friends, break a sweat, and become a superstar. Our mission is to connect the world by simulating it.
tags: industry:sports-tech; industry:virtual-reality; industry:fitness; industry:gaming; industry:social; location:los-angeles

founders.name: Justin Hubert, Founder
founders.description:
3D artist specializing in virtual reality (VR) production. Based in Long Beach, CA.

Cofounder Gym Class by IRL Studios Inc. W22. Previously led VR art development at Insperience ( Walmart's Store No. 8 )

founders.name: Paul Katsen, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder Gym Class (W22) and cofounded Blockspring (S14) which exited to Coinbase. Led Product for Twitter's Home feed, the company's largest surface with ~200M daily active users. Shipped consumer crypto products at Coinbase - like USDC Interest, Coinbase Card, instant debit withdrawals, instant deposit, global send/receive, and more.

generated_description:
### Company Overview: Gym Class by IRL Studios

**Website:** [gymclassvr.com](https://gymclassvr.com)  
**Founded:** 2021  
**Location:** Los Angeles, CA  
**Team Size:** 8 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W22  

**Mission:**  
Gym Class aims to redefine the basketball experience by allowing users to play in a fully immersive virtual reality environment, connecting people worldwide through the love of the game. It's more than just a game; it's a way to make friends, stay active, and aspire to basketball stardom.

### Key Highlights

- **Popularity:** Since launching on the Meta Quest Store in October 2022, Gym Class has swiftly climbed the ranks to become the most played sports game on the platform, boasting an impressive user rating of 4.9 stars.
- **Funding Success:** The company has secured over $8 million from prominent investors, including tech giants Andreessen Horowitz, Y Combinator, and even the NBA with endorsements from renowned players like Kevin Durant and Lonzo Ball.
- **Partnerships:** In early 2023, Gym Class established a licensing relationship with the NBA, enhancing its credibility and expanding its audience reach.

### Team and Expertise

Cofounders Matthew Harris, Justin Hubert, and Paul Katsen bring robust backgrounds in gaming and technology. Matthew and Justin previously led teams at Zynga and a VR studio, while Paul has significant experience with Twitter's product strategy, directly impacting user engagement.

### What's Next?

Gym Class is not just focused on the game; they emphasize a culture of rapid feedback and collaboration. Employees get to interact directly with the cofounders, making it a dynamic environment for those interested in pushing the boundaries of virtual reality and social gaming.

### Engagement Channels

Stay connected and follow Gym Class across various platforms:
- **[TikTok](https://gymclassvr.com/<http:/tiktok.com/@gymclassvr>)**
- **[Instagram](https://gymclassvr.com/<http:/instagram.com/gymclassvr>)**
- **[YouTube](https://gymclassvr.com/<http:/youtube.com/@gymclassvr>)**
- **[Twitter](https://gymclassvr.com/<http:/twitter.com/gymclassvr>)**

### Conclusion

Gym Class by IRL Studios isn't just leading the way in VR basketball—it represents a movement towards more interactive, social, and fun fitness experiences. Whether you're looking to sharpen your skills, meet like-minded enthusiasts, or just enjoy the thrill of the game, Gym Class has got you covered.
